advanced/architecture-diagrams.description: Visual representations of QWED's architecture and data flow.

advanced/attestations.description: Generate and verify cryptographic proofs of verification.

advanced/self-hosting.description: Run QWED on your own infrastructure.

api/authentication.title: Authentication
api/authentication.description: How to authenticate with the QWED API.

api/dsl-reference.title: QWED-Logic DSL Reference
api/dsl-reference.description: Quick reference for the QWED-Logic Domain Specific Language.

api/endpoints.title: API Endpoints
api/endpoints.description: Complete reference for all QWED API endpoints.

api/errors.title: Error Codes
api/errors.description: Complete reference for QWED error codes.

api/overview.title: API Overview
api/overview.description: QWED provides a RESTful API for verification.

engines/code.title: Code Engine
engines/code.description: Security analysis of code using AST parsing and pattern detection.

engines/consensus.title: Consensus Engine
engines/consensus.description: The Consensus Engine orchestrates multiple verification engines for high-confidence results with fault tolerance.

engines/fact.title: Fact Engine
engines/fact.description: The Fact Engine verifies factual claims using deterministic methods first, without requiring LLM calls for most claims.

engines/image.title: Image Engine
engines/image.description: The Image Engine verifies claims about images using deterministic methods first, with VLM fallback only for complex semantic claims.

engines/logic.title: Logic Engine
engines/logic.description: SAT/SMT solving using Z3 for logical constraint verification.

engines/math.title: Math Engine
engines/math.description: Deterministic verification of mathematical expressions using SymPy.

engines/overview.title: Verification Engines
engines/overview.description: QWED provides 8 specialized verification engines, each using deterministic methods first and LLM only as fallback.

engines/reasoning.title: Reasoning Engine
engines/reasoning.description: The Reasoning Engine validates LLM reasoning traces using chain-of-thought parsing and multi-provider verification.

engines/sql.title: SQL Engine
engines/sql.description: SQL query validation and injection detection.

engines/stats.title: Stats Engine
engines/stats.description: The Stats Engine executes statistical queries on tabular data using secure sandboxed execution.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: Get QWED up and running in minutes.

getting-started/llm-configuration.title: LLM Configuration
getting-started/llm-configuration.description: QWED works with any LLM provider. This guide shows you how to configure different LLM backends.

integrations/crewai.title: CrewAI Integration
integrations/crewai.description: Use QWED with CrewAI for verified multi-agent systems.

integrations/langchain.title: LangChain Integration
integrations/langchain.description: Use QWED with LangChain for verified AI chains and agents.

integrations/llamaindex.title: LlamaIndex Integration
integrations/llamaindex.description: Use QWED with LlamaIndex for verified RAG pipelines.

intro.title: Welcome to QWED
intro.description: "Trust, but Verify." â€” QWED treats LLMs as untrusted translators and uses symbolic engines as trusted verifiers.

sdks/go.description: The official Go SDK for QWED.

sdks/overview.description: QWED provides official SDKs for 4 languages.

sdks/python.description: The official Python SDK for QWED.

sdks/rust.description: The official Rust SDK for QWED.

sdks/typescript.title: TypeScript SDK
sdks/typescript.description: The official TypeScript/JavaScript SDK for QWED.

specs/overview.description: QWED is defined by formal specifications that enable interoperability.
